The claim states that an unnamed donor g: 17 million to the Leo-affiliated Judicial Crisis Network to block the nomination of Judge Merrick Garland and to support Gorsuch, and then another $17 million to prop up Kavanaugh. This aspect of the claim is verified by the expert's verdict, which confirms that the Judicial Crisis Network received two donations totaling $34 million during the Supreme Court confirmation fights.
